Reviews.Title: “very poor”
Reviews.Author: danelle g
Reviews.Content: arrived eve greeted nice explained helpful found poor decor clean found facilities terrible toilet roll told didnt toilet roll kept told tesco road unacceptable seen paid £130 night hostel

Reviews.Title: “Good little hotel, very comfortable”
Reviews.Author: PhilGlew
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel night 845pm monday late checkin ring doorbell trouble greeted friendly swiftly explained checked explained booked double didnt triple instead fine size warm cosy decor hey paid £39 court hotel night bathroom size whilst cracked tiles nice plenty hot water nice clean towels shampoo soap freebies normally seen ina budget hotels hotel situated close earls court tube station ten minute walk location commuters nights sleep comfortable bed soft cosy kettle teacoffee hairdryer tv freeview reception amount plug sockets able charge phones checking fine key reason havent hotel five stars mixed fridge whilst excellent feature integrated makes humming noise constantly doesnt disturb sleep whilst luxury feature bit annoying definitely stay money paid comfortable suitable lone business traveller friends visiting central london looking cheap nights

Reviews.Title: “Ok hotel but too much street noise”
Reviews.Author: alicec79
Reviews.Content: wouldnt stay noise busy road front hotel didnt sleep 6 son 5am couldnt sleep noise aside staff helpful hotel nice parents double tiny didnt mind breakfast basic job
